## Resume

-   an application for a position in industry, non-profit, and public sector

-   skills, work experience, educuation

-   within 2 pages

## CV

-   applying for positions in academia, fellowships and grants

-   academic accomplishments

-   Length depends upon experience and includes a complete list of publications, posters, and presentations

-   begins with education and can include name of advisor and dissertation title or summary (see examples). Also used for merit/tenure review and sabbatical leave
